Package controller

Class DefaultState

java.lang.Object
controller.DefaultState
All Implemented Interfaces:
State
Direct Known Subclasses:
StateAddDeliveryRequestToComputedTour, StateComputeBestTour, StateCourierManagement, StateGenerateRoadMap, StateInitializeTour, StateLoadCityMap, StateLoadDeliveryRequests, StateManageDeliveryRequests, StateRemoveDeliveryRequestToComputedTour
public class DefaultState extends Object implements State
This class provides default implementations for the State interface methods.
Author:
H4114
